name: FamilyOfficeTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open family office trivia”
”Alexa, start family office trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: family office trivia
des: Alexa quizzes you on trivia topics. Provide the answer and try to achieve a high score. Play and learn information that cover topics including investment strategy in direct and alternatives, economic indicators, financial reporting essentials, laws, policy and regulations, ethics, estate planning, tax advisory and other topics recommended for every Single and Multi Family Office professional.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
